body.p: This is an overview document to collect the most important pieces from our opening seminar. From here you'll find links to:

ul.li: a presentation of what spellers are (in Norwegian)

body.p: It is funny and useful reading comparing the plans (cf. opening presentation and project routines) with the reality.
body.note: The documentation infrastructure was not fully in place ahead of this meeting, and the documents are therefore non-standard. Another indication of this early phase is that several of the documents are in Norwegian.
